description: This file contains Backbone.js models, collections, views, and router for a Todo application, including model definitions, view logic, routing, and application initialization.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Model representing a single Todo item with attributes 'title' and 'completed', including methods to toggle completion and clear itself.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: Collection of Todo models, backed by localStorage, with methods to filter completed/remaining, get next order, and sort.

classes.name: TodoView
classes.description: View for individual Todo items, handling rendering, editing, toggling, and removal.

classes.name: TodoRouter
classes.description: Router managing filter routes for the Todo app.

classes.name: AppView
classes.description: Main application view managing the overall Todo list UI, event handling, and application initialization.

methods.name: defaults
methods.description: Returns default attributes for a Todo model.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes a Todo model, ensuring it has a title.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the 'completed' state of the Todo.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes the Todo from storage and deletes its view.

methods.name: completed
methods.description: Filters and returns completed Todo models.

methods.name: remaining
methods.description: Filters and returns remaining (not completed) Todo models.

methods.name: nextOrder
methods.description: Calculates the next order number for new Todo items.

methods.name: comparator
methods.description: Defines sorting order based on 'order' attribute.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the Todo item view.

methods.name: toggleDone
methods.description: Toggles the completion state of the Todo.

methods.name: toggleVisible
methods.description: Shows or hides the Todo based on current filter.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Switches the view into editing mode.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Saves changes or clears the Todo if empty.

methods.name: updateOnEnter
methods.description: Handles Enter key to save edits.

methods.name: revertOnEscape
methods.description: Handles Escape key to cancel editing.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Destroys the Todo model.

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Sets the current filter for Todo list.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the overall app UI, including stats and filter indicators.

methods.name: addOne
methods.description: Adds a single Todo item to the list UI.

methods.name: addAll
methods.description: Adds all Todo items to the list UI.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Sets the current filter criteria.

methods.name: filterOne
methods.description: Triggers visibility update for a Todo.

methods.name: filterAll
methods.description: Applies filter to all Todos.

methods.name: newAttributes
methods.description: Creates attribute object for new Todo.

methods.name: createOnEnter
methods.description: Creates a new Todo when Enter is pressed.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all completed Todos.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Marks all Todos as completed or active.
